doc:
Adrian Grenier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrian_Grenier 0 Adrian Grenier (born July 10, 1976) is an American actor, producer, director, musician and environmentalist. He is best known for playing Vincent Chase in the TV series Entourage (2004–2011). He starred in the films Drive Me Crazy, The Devil Wears Prada, and Entourage. Adrian_Grenier ( born July_10_,_1976 ) is an_American_actor , producer_,_director_,_musician_and_environmentalist . He is_best_known for playing Vincent_Chase in the_TV_series_Entourage_(_2004 – 2011_) . He starred in the_films Drive Me Crazy , The_Devil Wears Prada , and Entourage .
